verses.text: Ach in Diosal yujto tzin a xajanej, ok'oc wal a k'ool t'ayin. Ha yuj a niwan ok'elk'olal, sucsat in mul.
B'ic in el t'a masanil in mul, tzin a sacb'itani.
Yel toni ix och in mul, ix in ek' t'a yib'anh, max b'atlaj satk'olal junok rato in mul chi' wuuj.
Ix och wal in mul chi' t'ayach. Ix in k'ulej chukal t'a yol a sat. Yuj chi' smoj wal ak'an in yaelal. Max yal-laj yalchaj chukal t'ayach ayic tzin a ch'olb'itani.
Val yel, yictax waljub'al chuk in. Toxonton chuk in atax yic cuchb'il into och yuj ix in nun.
Val yel tza xajanej mach snib'ej tojolal t'a smasanil sk'ool. Yuj chi' ak' a jelanil t'ayin.
nhikkanel in mul yic tzin sacb'ikaneli. B'ic in eli, yic wach' sacxonhej tzin ajkan icha k'een sacb'akom.
Ak'xi in tzalajk'olal in k'ana' yic tz'el in cusk'olal yuj b'aj ix ak' in yaelal sik'lab'il.
Manhxo a nacot in mul chi', tza sukan sat masanil in chukal.
Ach in Diosal, tojolb'itej in pensar. Ha junok ak' b'eyb'al tzak' t'ayin yic tzin k'anab'ajej yet' smasanil in k'ool.
Manh in ik'kanel t'a ichanh, manh ik'paxel a Santo Espíritu t'ayin.
Ak'xi in tzalajk'olal yuj in colnab'il. Ak' wip yic b'ekan in k'ool ach in k'anab'ajani,
yic wach' tzin k'ayb'ej heb' chuk yic sb'eyb'alej a b'eyb'al heb' yic smeltzajoch heb' t'a yol a k'ab'.
Ach in Diosal, ix ak' in colnab'il, manhxo a cha in mil anima, colinel t'a in mul yic ol walan a tojolal t'a b'italil.
Mamin, jac in ti' yic ol ach in b'itani.
Tato a ofrenda, ma silab' nhusb'il tza nib'ej, tzam wak'laj, ocxo jun, max a nib'ej paxlaj.
Ha tas a gana, aton heb' scus sk'ol yuj smul. Ach in Diosal, max a patiquejel-laj anima syik'em sb'a yujto sna sb'a yuj smul.
Ak' a wach'k'olal t'a Sion. Yuj swach'il a k'ool, b'oxik'e smuroal Jerusalén.
Ichato wal chi' t'a tzalajk'olal ol aj a chaan silab' a gana tz'ak'ji t'ayach, aton nok' nok' snhusji. Ichato chi' ol ak'joc nok' wakax silab'il t'ayach t'a altar.
